data.why:
Various modules, starting with File::Signature, a (unix specific)
    module for detecting whether a file's content or attributes have
    changed. In time, I expect to contribute Tie::Stream::Scalar,
    Tie::Stream::Array, and Tie::Stream::Handle, three interfaces to
    infinite streams. Also, I might upload Template::Simple which is, I
    think, the -minimal- templating solution that everyone tries to
    re-invent (by default it assumes the template comes after __DATA__
    making it real useful for short CGIs and such.)
